entry.title: Here are 4 things I eat every single day without fail: 1. Something fermented: This is my top gut health habit! It’s usually kimchi because I love it on toast with peanut butter, in salads or with noodles. Other things I’ll eat are fermented cashew chees

entry.title: Smacked cucumber but make it beany!! Hannah from @Bold Bean Co came over to make some beany recipes with me and the second one we made was this DELICIOUS tenderstem brocolli, smacked cucumber and black bean salad with a satay-ish sauce and a load of fresh

entry.title: If you’ve never tried the combination of tahini with date syrup, let me tell you that it’s the most decadent, indulgent caramel-y drizzle that ever existed. Creamy, nutty and perfectly balanced sweetness. So of course it was insanely good on an affogato!
entry.content: If you’ve never tried the combination of tahini with date syrup, let me tell you that it’s the most decadent, indulgent caramel-y drizzle that ever existed. Creamy, nutty and perfectly balanced sweetness. So of course it was insanely good on an affogato!

entry.title: Silken tofu is the ideal speedy lunch or dinner so I always keep some in the cupboard. This is a really delicious and summery way to eat it! Full recipe is below and also on my website (link in my bio). Ingredients: 1 x 300g box silken tofu 15g toasted
entry.content: Silken tofu is the ideal speedy lunch or dinner so I always keep some in the cupboard. This is a really delicious and summery way to eat it! Full recipe is below and also on my website (link in my bio). Ingredients: 1 x 300g box silken tofu 15g toasted

entry.title: I WROTE A COOKBOOK! I couldn’t be more excited to share this news :) My first cookbook, Big Veg Energy is available to preorder now from a selection of retailers and you can find the link in my bio. Preorders mean the absolute world to first time authors
entry.content: I WROTE A COOKBOOK! I couldn’t be more excited to share this news :) My first cookbook, Big Veg Energy is available to preorder now from a selection of retailers and you can find the link in my bio. Preorders mean the absolute world to first time authors

entry.title: I found the perfect vegan brownie recipe on the @GuardianFeast app! There are so many vegan recipes on there! There are also loads of great features like the search bar which lets you search by your favourite chefs, dietaries, ingredients and meal type.

entry.title: If you’re looking for a creamy, cosy bowl of goodness that you can make in 10 minutes - you’ve just found one. A dollop of vegan cream cheese mixed with the cherry tomato juice and the butterbean aquafaba magincally turns into a delicious velvety broth.
entry.content: If you’re looking for a creamy, cosy bowl of goodness that you can make in 10 minutes - you’ve just found one. A dollop of vegan cream cheese mixed with the cherry tomato juice and the butterbean aquafaba magincally turns into a delicious velvety broth.
